meanings.definition: The skill, knowledge, or experience of a connoisseur.
meanings.sent1: Her connoisseurship in fine wines allowed her to distinguish the subtle differences in flavors.
meanings.sent2: His connoisseurship in art made him a sought-after advisor for art collectors.
meanings.sent3: With his connoisseurship in ice cream, he could tell the brand just by tasting it.
meanings.sent4: Her connoisseurship in fashion was like having a personal stylist at all times.
meanings.sent5: The depth of his connoisseurship in rare books was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: The act of being a connoisseur.
meanings.sent1: The connoisseurship of the sommelier was evident in the way he described each wine.
meanings.sent2: She approached the task with the connoisseurship of a seasoned expert.
meanings.sent3: His connoisseurship in cheese tasting competitions always led to interesting results.
meanings.sent4: The connoisseurship of the art dealer was unmatched in the city.
meanings.sent5: Their connoisseurship in antique furniture was well-known among collectors.
